personal.name: Jhordeym Santos
personal.title: 👨🏻‍💻 JhVS Development | Full Stack Engineer 💡
personal.bio:
Hi, I’m a full-stack web developer with over 7 years of experience turning complex ideas into clean, high-performing web applications.
I specialize in building fast, responsive websites and scalable backend systems using modern tools like React, Next.js, and Node.js.
Whether you're launching a product or upgrading your platform, I focus on creating solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and tailored to your business goals.
